DOC.brief_summary: Near infrared spectroscopy ( NIRS ) technique measure regional cerebral oxygenation non-invasive manner . Through use near infrared light , difference oxygenate deoxygenated hemoglobin measure . By apply Beer-Lamber law , numeric result calculate . During cardiac arrest , stroke volume , cardiac output cerebral perfusion . By use cerebral NIRS out-of hospital cardiac arrest , low flow time return spontaneous circulation , study want show prognostic value NIRS extra monitoring .
DOC.brief_title: Prehospital Cerebral Oxygenation During Cardiopulmonary Resuscitation ( CPR )
